scripts.say: Hahahahaha~! It's been ages since I've had this much fun! The sky really is the limit for the potential of your Wisdom Cubes!
Listen here! We, the Sirens, are your enemy! We are the big bad meanies who take your oceans as our own! We are the ones who cause all the wars in the world! And don't you forget it!
Next time we meet, I'll have an even more powerful weapon for you guys! Until then, stay alive and get stronger for me! Hahahaha~!
By the glory of the Royal Family, spill thy blood before us! Return to the icy abyss that you crawled from!
Phew... We did it... Our connection to HQ has been restored, so the ocean should soon return to normal, too...
Good grief, I never expected such a situation to develop...
But luckily, we managed to seize an unexpected victory as well as gather valuable intelligence on the Sirens.
O valiant one, thy performance was pivotal to our outcome today. Victorious, it was an honour to fight at thy side.
Why, thank you!
There's another communication from headquarters. They suggested to leave Tirpitz to the base's air squadron.
That settles it then. We can go home now!
So the Queen in the North has been deprived of her crown... But I suppose that's what she wanted...
... Oh, dear me, I'm getting distracted again...
So you had Victorious' planes shot down to lure her in... Well planned.
It was my only choice for dealing with Code G. Fortunately, it didn't cause a major discrepancy in the end.
And our only loss was a single Purifier model. Wouldn't you agree this was the best possible outcome?
I suppose... So, have you gotten used to your new body yet, Purifier?
Pheeew! I had the time of my life! I even gained tons of combat experience!
Those Royal Navy girls should experience their awakening soon, so the North Sea should be good for a while.
Anyway, c'mon, send me out on my next mission already~
Ah, yes, your next mission...
How would you like to see cherry trees in full bloom?
